pkgmetadata.longdescription: Incorporating Stability Information into Cross-Sectional Estimates // The goal of 'stim' is to provide a function for estimating the Stability Informed Model. The Stability Informed Model integrates stability information (how much a variable correlates with itself in the future) into cross-sectional estimates. Wysocki and Rhemtulla (2022) https://psyarxiv.com/vg5as.
